tool_description: A historical monthly breakdown of the top 200 games on twitch
name: Twitch Game Popularity
title: Twitch Game Popularity

api_list.name: games
api_list.description: A list of all games included in our database
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://twitch-game-popularity.p.rapidapi.com/games"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "twitch-game-popularity.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://twitch-game-popularity.p.rapidapi.com/games"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "twitch-game-popularity.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: game
api_list.description: A catch all endpoint that lets you query by game, get historical data by year or by month
